channel.title: How do i get my server to run with hamachi?
channel.description: Because my mom blocked my ports so im hopeing that this will prevent the offline problem.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 25, 2007, 06:38:31 PM[/size][hr]Because i have no clue how to run it can some one post step by step what to do to get your server on hamachi?

item.title: How do i get my server to run with hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @Element_SoftwareTM Element SoftwareTM
item.description:
@Element_SoftwareTM wrote:

[ul][li]Download Hamachi.[/li]
[li]Start it up.[list]
[li]And make a network.[/li]
[li]put on moparscape server status[/li]
[/list][/li][/ul]
